identified-content.person: OLT, AMY ST. CLAIR (AMY ST. CLAIR DOLAN)

block.p: Amy St. Clair Olt and Stephen Frederick Dolan were married yesterday at St. Pius X Church in Fairfield, Conn. Msgr. Edward J. Scull performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Dolan is the assistant educational director at Educational Diagnostic Services in Riverside, Conn., a testing and tutoring concern for children with learning disabilities. The bride, a graduate of the University of California at San Diego, is also a candidate for a Ph.D. in cognitive studies from Columbia University Teachers College, from which she received a master's degree in developmental psychology.
Amy St. Clair Olt and Stephen Frederick Dolan were married yesterday at St. Pius X Church in Fairfield, Conn. Msgr. Edward J. Scull performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Dolan is the assistant educational director at Educational Diagnostic Services in Riverside, Conn., a testing and tutoring concern for children with learning disabilities. The bride, a graduate of the University of California at San Diego, is also a candidate for a Ph.D. in cognitive studies from Columbia University Teachers College, from which she received a master's degree in developmental psychology.
She is a daughter of the late Mr. and Mrs. Robert D. Olt. The bride's father was the managing director of the Lotepro Group, an engineering concern that was in New York.

Mr. Dolan is an account manager in New York for WorldCom, the telecommunications company. He graduated from Colorado State University. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas M. Dolan of Fairfield, Conn. The bridegroom's mother, Nancy M. Dolan, is a sales agent at Nicholas H. Fingelly Real Estate in Southport, Conn. His father works in Southport as the vice president for Northeast regional sales of both the Renown Steel Company and Dynamic Metals Processing.
